tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE MalwareEntities (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    name TEXT NOT NULL,
    type TEXT NOT NULL,
    description TEXT,
    detection_method TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE MalwareSignatures (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    signature TEXT NOT NULL UNIQUE,
    date_added TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    malware_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (malware_id) REFERENCES MalwareEntities(id)
);

CREATE TABLE MalwareReports (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    report TEXT NOT NULL,
    date_reported TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    malware_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (malware_id) REFERENCES MalwareEntities(id)
);
